tool_description: Talk to mobile users inside your app. Used by m-commerce, SAAS and Subscription services, and mobile hardware companies to increase retention
name: Hipmob
title: Hipmob

api_list.name: Get Device Message Count
api_list.description: Retrieves the number of undelivered messages that have been sent to the device running the specified application and using the specified host application identifier.

api_list.name: Get Device Friends
api_list.description: Retrieves the host application identifiers of all devices that are considered friends of the specified device: these are the devices that can send messages to this device, or receive messages from this device.

api_list.name: List Transcripts
api_list.description: Lists all the transcripts saved for the company associated with the authenticated Hipmob account.

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: A number greater than zero that will be the starting offset to be used. A combination of the start parameter and the pagesize parameter can be used for paging through transcripts.

optional_parameters.name: pagesize
optional_parameters.description: A number greater than zero that will be the starting offset to be used. A combination of the start parameter and the pagesize parameter can be used for paging through transcripts.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: A number greater than zero that will be the starting offset to be used. A combination of the start parameter and the pagesize parameter can be used for paging through transcripts.

api_list.name: Get Device Details
api_list.description: Retrieves the details saved for the device running the specified application and using the specified host application identifier that has connected to the Hipmob communication network.

api_list.name: Check if Device Exists
api_list.description: Checks to see if the device running the specified application and using the specified host application identifier is currently online.

api_list.name: Get Application Details
api_list.description: Returns the application details for a specific application associated with the authenticated Hipmob account. The API identifies the requested application by its internal Hipmob ID, which is identical to the application's ID.

api_list.name: List Applications
api_list.description: Lists all the applications associated with the authenticated Hipmob account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hipmob.p.rapidapi.com/apps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hipmob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hipmob.p.rapidapi.com/apps"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hipmob.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Transcript
api_list.description: Returns the transcript details for a specific transcript in the company associated with the authenticated Hipmob account. The API identifies the requested transcript by its internal Hipmob ID, retrieved using the List Transcripts API call.

api_list.name: Get User Details
api_list.description: Returns the details for a specific user. The API identifies the user by its internal Hipmob username.
